title.rendered: Indraneel by Sonam Builders | Luxurious 2 & 3 BHK Flats in Mira Road East, Thane

content.rendered:
Project Descriptions

Indraneel by Sonam Builders is a well-designed residential project located on MariGold Road, Beverly Park, Mira Road East, Thane. Its grande-height lobby and inviting atmosphere set the tone for the entire property. The luxurious design of its 2 and 3 BHK flats along with floor-to-floor height of 3.15 meters, or 10.33 feet, creates a feel of calm every home should give you. The entryways, dining, and living areas are accessorized with Italian marble. Form meets function with the premium 2 and 3 BHK flats at Indraneel, and whether you’re moving to work or for play, its strategic location ensures that you get close to whatever matters to you the most. 

The safety standards of this Indraneel are high. They have an intercom system along with a video door phone to keep minute vigilance and add a layer of security for the residents. It’s a home that enriches everyday life and is a perfect choice for those seeking a higher quality of life in the bustling city of Thane.

Achieve Optimal Health & Wellness At Your Doorstep

For those seeking a calmer, more meditative approach to well-being, the yoga room provides the perfect environment for relaxation and mindfulness. Additionally, the swimming pool and separate kids’ pool create opportunities for water-based exercises, which are known to reduce stress, improve cardiovascular health, and promote overall fitness. The wide range of recreational options, from indoor games like carrom, chess, table tennis, and pool, to outdoor activities on the cricket turf, ensures that there is always an opportunity for residents to come together and enjoy shared experiences. 

Features & Amenities: Community Hall

  • Rain Water Harvesting
  • Garden Landscape
  • Ramps
  • Parking spaces
  • Fire Fighting Systems
  • Room Street Lights
  • A gargantuan gym with weight lifting and cardio facilities
  • Dedicated yoga room, a swimming pool, and a separate kids’ pool
  • 24/7 Surveillance
  • Carrom, chess, table tennis, pool table, and a cricket turf for endless fun.
  • Luxurious movie theater, library, children’s zone, and a multi-purpose lawn

Necessary Conveniences At A Very Near Distance

Indraneel By Sonam Builders is just 2.9 Km away from Mira Road Station, which means that commuting via Mumbai’s extensive railway network is quick and easy. For example, the Western Express Highway is just 19 kilometers from the estate. This will directly lead to most of the key places in the city. Everything is so close; people do not have to waste precious time navigating long distances or put up with the frustration of traffic jams. 

Proximity:-

Education

  • RBK School – (800 Mts)
  • S.V.P.V. School – (1.9 Km)

Transportation

  • Mira Road Station – (2.9 Kms)
  • Western Express Highway (W.E. Highway) – (19 Km)

Retailing and Procurement

  • Central Brand Factory -(18.2 Km)
  • Maxus Mall – (3.9 Km)

Healthcare:-

  • Wockhardt Hospital – (1.7 Km)
  • Jain Hospital (1.8 Km)

Amusement:-

  • PVR Cinemas – (800 Mts)

Other Landmarks:-

  • Silver Park (2.6 Km)
  • McDonald’s (1.5 Km)
  • MBMC Garden (1.7 Kms)

Configuration Details:

About the Builder

Sonam Group’s perfect understanding of customer needs and market trends ensures they constantly meet the changing demands of urban living. They have won countless loyal customers, most of whom have made subsequent investments. The company is also known for the on-time delivery of projects. Being in an industry where most of the developers are known for delay and failed promises, Sonam Group has been able to assure their customers that they would move into their new homes or offices on time. Their strict adherence to timelines and clarity throughout the process qualify them as a developer clients can trust. 

RERA No.: P51700027465 

Indraneel By Sonam Builders offers a lifestyle upgrade that few other developments can match. Its prime location ensures that you’re never too far from the best the city has to offer. Homes at Indraneel are selling fast, and with such a keenly sought-after location and superior amenities, it comes as no surprise. Whether an upgrade to your lifestyle or a sound investment, the Indraneel by Sonam Builders offers everything you could want in a home and, indeed, much more. The life you deserve is waiting; are you ready to make it yours? Contact Property Plateau today.
